website_summaries.verdict: A large-sized flip chart with self-stick paper at a decent price.
pros: Four-pack provides the same practicality as the Post-it brand at a much lower cost
Two holes at the top make this pad easy to hang from most standard flip-chart easels
Self-stick function works well and does not take the paint from the walls
cons: This model does not have a self-easel stand like some others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Great posters!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the name brand posters for years in my classroom. These are just as great for a fraction of the cost. When my technology goes down, I can teach the old fashioned way using these posters. The ink doesn’t bleed through either. The adhesive is good quality, and my posters hang quite well. I will continue to buy these in the future and have recommended these to my colleagues.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Heidner

customer_reviews.title: Great for classroom use!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! Use them for anchor charts in my classroom. Some of them I have had up since the beginning of the year and they are STILL sticky. Leaves no marks on the walls. No problem with paint being taken off either.
customer_reviews.author: Amk

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These were the cheapest easel pads I could find, and they work great! A little hard to tear because the adhesion is strong, but not an issue if you're careful. We use permanent markers on these and as long as you don't let the marker stay in one place too long, the ink won't bleed through.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: More affordable and just as good, if not better than the name bran.
customer_reviews.author: WALTER D BECK

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to expensive post it paper. A little thin, but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive flip chart paper just like I wanted without the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: These flip chart pads are great. They are just as adhesive as the Post-it flip charts but more economical.
customer_reviews.author: ASull

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I use these in class and the kids love them, and they make poster projects possible for my kids who can’t buy one. We use them for reciprocal teaching, note taking, and assignments. I write the directions on a big sheet for every major assignment, and then it’s there for kids to turn back to if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality-not the best
customer_reviews.text: The paper is really thin and so the marker bleeds through to the next paper really easily. It doesn’t fit very well on my board. When you take the paper off the back is sticky-that part is awesome it lasts too.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Quality paper
customer_reviews.text: My king size sharpies don't bleed through to the wall. My office is newly painted (about 3-4 months ago) so I don't know if that effects the stickiness but these occasionally fall off my wall. The second pack I've used sticks great. I don't know if that's because it's on the same section of the wall or perhaps the stickiness on the first set wasn't as good.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Great adhesive!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT. Very sticky. The pages will rip easily if you don’t take a little care in tearing off. Markers do not bleed through to next page.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: My mom uses these for her classes
customer_reviews.text: Since my mom hasn't complained about them, I assume they're fine
customer_reviews.author: G.S. Fordham

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous and work great for the office. Much better value for the money. Sticks great and removes without residue.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Makes great anchor charts for teachers
customer_reviews.text: I use them in my classroom. I have a dry race board with lines on it and it’s see-through so I can use the lines to keep my anchor charts straight. After I write them with the class by then stick them on the wall. I go through about four or five a week
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the adhesive strip was a bit stickier but overall very happy with the price and product. I have ordered this item twice.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kimmerly

customer_reviews.title: not quality a  product
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with getting a quality item. The first one had pages already torn off of the pads of paper. The replacement one only had 1 pad of paper attached to the cardboard to hang it up with.
customer_reviews.author: Love to travel

customer_reviews.title: Good paper, good adhesive, but corners are crushed on all 4 pads!
customer_reviews.text: Have no choice to keep and use because well, we need them, but it's crappy how bad of shape they are in.
customer_reviews.author: Achraely

customer_reviews.title: Flip Chart pads damaged
customer_reviews.text: Too much effort to return damaged flip chart pads. Tow of the 4 have one corner completely damaged and crunched so corner will never lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: The items arrived quickly, and were what was needed! Great Product at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: VERY DECENTLY MADE, VERY GOOD-VALUE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Seem to me to be just as well made and sticky as the 3M expensive ones that I used to use. Really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for flip charting. The ripped sheets adhere to wall surfaces beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: PFid

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These are great. On my ‘buy again’ list. Nice and stiff back so it doesn’t droop like other brands
customer_reviews.author: beach momma

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a great product. The adhesive is a little weak over time in comparison to the Post-it brand. I would still buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: mpurple27

customer_reviews.title: Not put together correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Out of a package of 4 one of the packages was not stapled correct and all of the paper fell out. I would love it if somebody would contact me and replace this one of the items so that I did not have to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality at the Right Price
customer_reviews.text: In store similar product is quite expensive; I am happy to find the good quality paper and adhesion for a very reasonable price for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: firs time happy , second time not happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a few months ago and everything was perfect, i bought it this week for a second time and my order was canceled , i was expecting this pads to use it this week, not happy
customer_reviews.author: Alan Faz

customer_reviews.title: So Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I order these every year for my business. These arrived in great shape and ready for use.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality easel paper for an affordable price. Like using them in the classroom to display skills taught in class and have held up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Just like post-it
customer_reviews.text: The work just as well as post it! I use them in my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: The product is very sturdy and great price for great quality.
customer_reviews.author: sean a murphy

customer_reviews.title: These work fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These are a lifesaver for teachers! I use them to put up anchor charts & lists everywhere! I have never had one fall down!
customer_reviews.author: Jscott

customer_reviews.title: Good. No issues, just like any other stick up easel pads.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Sticks well, no residue. I have the 3M, traditional brand and these work just as good as the 3M version. The paper is thick enough and bright enough that it seems like it is all high quality stuff. If you use a lot of these stick up easel pads, then this is another great option for your use. I wouldn't hesitate recommending you give them a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size, Good Construction, Sticks Well
customer_reviews.text: These pads are a nice size and stick well to a variety of walls -- they do great on painted walls, whiteboards, and glass. We have some exposed brick walls at the office and these even did OK on those, though didn't stay up quite as well. The paper is a good thickness, not much bleeding even if you use a wide tipped permanent marker. Definitely recommend for using in an office, for kiddo drawings, or in a classroom!
customer_reviews.author: NY to VA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for use in the classroom
customer_reviews.text: I love these easel pads. I use ones like this in my classroom all the time with my high school science kids. This particular set of easel pads seems pretty high-quality, and I think the sticky strip (to essentially make the pages giant post-it notes) is great! It's fun having kids write on the pages, and then hang the pages around my classroom for a "gallery walk"- type activity. The set is a bit more expensive than I'd like for just four pads, but sets like these (especially with the sticky strip) tend to be a bit pricey in general. Overall, a great set of easel pads. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Arteri

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as name brand!
customer_reviews.text: I use the post-it version of these all the time in my classroom for anchor charts we create. I gave these a try as an alternative. They are the same size and do the same thing for less money. I love them and they are great for making anchor charts in my classroom. They stick just as well as the post-it version I own.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: As Good As the Name Brand
customer_reviews.text: I do a good many standup presentations, often at locations I haven't visited before. Unlike cheaper pads I find these stick well to most any surface, including "hotel ballroom wallpaper". Holds tight, peels off pad with out tearing, and Mr Sketch markers don't bleed through. As good as the more expensive brand name self-stick pads.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Bozarth

customer_reviews.title: 4/Pack
customer_reviews.text: This is a 4/pack of self stick easel pads. The adhesive strip with adhere to most surfaces for quick display. The cardboard backing makes for easy writing. The pages tear out cleanly for less damage. I use these with my granddaughter. She loves to draw and do art projects. I keep these at my house and she has a lot of fun and I display her work afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the classroom
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher, I go through a few of these a year. Whenever we do group work, I like to have the students write their work down on one of these sheets and then hang it up on the wall for us to go through. It is a good way to allow everyone to see what has been written and every have a chance to write on the paper as well. The Post-it Sticky works great on almost any surface. It is also something that can be unstuck and restuck several times, which is often the case when a student hangs something up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality -- and great for classroom use
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy the 3M/Post-It note version of this large pads, but the price got to be outrageous on those. These easel pads are a great alternative. I use these in my classes to have my students do work, and the paper is nice and thick so that markers don't bleed through. The stickiness is also great, so that they stay up on the wall, without leaving a residue when you remove them.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the classroom and small-group breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of space in my room and need to be able to put-up and take-down anchor charts with ease. These fit the bill. Plus, when I have kiddos break out into groups, I can give each group their own sheet to work on and then easily display.
customer_reviews.author: Jarucia Jaycox

product_meta.title: Business Source 25"x30" Self-Stick Easel Pads, 4/Pack (38592)
product_meta.description: Easel pad features a self-stick adhesive strip that instantly adheres to most surfaces to display your work in any easy-to-see location. Cardboard backing creates a sturdy writing surface to help keep your handwriting neat and legible. Removable pages are unruled to provide plenty of space to showcase large amounts of work. Easel pad is perfect for presentations, meetings and more.
feature_bullets: Self-stick adhesive strip adheres to most surfaces for quick display
Cardboard backing provides smooth, sturdy writing surface
Removable pages tear out cleanly for damage-free separation
Unruled format provides ample space for writing and drawing
Perfect for presentations, meetings, brainstorming sessions and more
Each comes on a sturdy cardboard backcard and contains 30 sheets

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars228 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
